short_definition: One which either terminates the action itself or decides some matter litigated by the parties or operates to divest some right or one which completely disposes of the subject matter and the rights of the parties.
long_definition_html: One which either terminates the action itself or decides some matter litigated by the parties or operates to divest some right or one which completely disposes of the subject matter and the rights of the parties.
long_definition_markdown: One which either terminates the action itself or decides some matter litigated by the parties or operates to divest some right or one which completely disposes of the subject matter and the rights of the parties.
long_definition_text: One which either terminates the action itself or decides some matter litigated by the parties or operates to divest some right or one which completely disposes of the subject matter and the rights of the parties.
